set metadata include
set notation binary
set format e64
append "../EngineRuntime/*.cpp;*.h" rec
set user 1
append "tools_windows/*"
set user 2
append "test/*"
set user 3
select name "*_build*"
exclude
invert
set quality e
set block 0x10000
set chain lzw huffman
set time c unset
set time a unset
set time m unset
finish
